reqs:
Pre-reqs: CIVL 320.
Co-reqs: APSC 201.
Do NOT contact the professor regarding registration problems.
If the course is full, please fill out the online course registration form available at the below web link http://www.civil.ubc.ca/webform/course-request-registration-form and submit it electronically.
courseName: Project Based Learning in Civil Engineering Materials
description: Some topical problems will be identified and students in groups will carry out experiments to study the materials involved. Site visits and external consultations are an integral requirement.
